Instance.description: Zone director used to control the appearance of patients and emergencies during a doctor active career event.

TunableList.name: emergency_frequency
TunableList.description:
Each entry in the emergency frequency has two components. The first component is the career level that it applies to.
The second component is that actual tuning for how frequently an emergency should occur.
The entry that is closest to the current career level of the Sim without exceeding the career level will be used.
For example, given the following tuning: career_level emergency_frequency: 1 Tuning A, 4 Tuning B, 9 Tuning C
If Sim is at career level 1, 2, or 3 then Tuning A will be used. If Sim is at career level 4, 5, 6, 7, or 8 then Tuning B will be used. If sim is at career level 9, 10 then Tuning C will be used.

TunableTuple.name: frequency_tuning
TunableTuple.description: Tuning for how often emergencies happen per career level.

Tunable.name: cool_down_in_sim_minutes
Tunable.description: How often a check for whether or not to create/start an emergency happens.

Tunable.name: inital_lockout_in_sim_minutes
Tunable.description: The time, in Sim minutes, that pass at the beginning of a shift before the first check for creating/starting an emergency happens.

Tunable.name: max_emergency_situations_per_shift
Tunable.description: The maximum number of times during a shift that an emergency situation can be created/started.

Tunable.name: percent_chance_of_emergency
Tunable.description: The percentage chance that on any given check an emergency is to to be created/started.

TunableList.name: weighted_situations
TunableList.description: A weighted list of situations to be used as emergencies. When a check passes to create/start an emergency, this is the list of emergency situations that will be chosen from.
